index.get_the_app: <s>Get the most out of itch.io!</s> Install and manage your games with our desktop app
index.recommendations_based_on: Based on things youve purchased, downloaded, and rated
index.fresh_games_description: Constantly updating with the latest games on itch.io
index.people_to_follow_description: Here are some accounts you might be interested in following. Why follow?
index.intro: <s>itch.io</s> is a simple way to find and share indie games online for free.
index.meta_description: itch.io is a simple way to find, download and distribute indie games online. Whether you're a developer looking to upload your game or just someone looking for something new to play itch.io has you covered.

blog.empty_message: There don't appear to be any posts here

login_form.or_log_in_with_another_site: Or log in with another site

intent.community: You'll need to log in to participate in communities on itch.io. Creating an account is free and only takes a few moments.
intent.comment: You'll need an account on itch.io before you can leave a comment.
intent.rate_game: You'll need an account on itch.io before you can rate a game.
intent.follow: You'll need an account on itch.io before you can follow someone.
intent.follow_username: You'll need an account on itch.io before you can follow <1>{{username}}</1>.
intent.collection: You'll need an account on itch.io before you can add to a collection.
intent.jam_submit: You'll need an account on itch.io before you can submit to a jam.
intent.claim_object: Please log in or create an account to claim the {{noun}}

user_login.no_account_prompt: Dont have an account? <1>Create an account</1>

errors.accept_terms: You must accept the Terms of Service

register_form.link_product: Your purchase of <1>{{product}}</1> will link to you account automatically after you register.
register_form.digest_signup: Sign me up for the bi-monthly itch.io digest newsletter
register_form.interest_gamer: I'm interested in playing or downloading games on itch.io
register_form.interest_developer: I'm interested in distributing content on itch.io
register_form.account_preferences_info: You can change your responses to these questions later, they are used to hint itch.io in how it should present itself to you.

developers.page_header: Create a custom page to instantly distribute or sell your indie games
developers.product_summary1: <s>itch.io</s> is a simple way to distribute your indie games online for free. Upload your game files and screenshots all to one place. Create a customized landing page where your game is the focus.
developers.product_summary2: You can even set a minimum price for your game, giving fans the opportunity to pay what they want for your game.
developers.account_faq_cta: <1>Create an account now</1> or <2>Read the FAQ</2>
developers.host_a_sale_description: Promote your games and get more purchases by offering your games at a discounted price for any period of time.
developers.browser_game_description: Make money from your browser game by hosting it on <s>itch.io</s>. Your game is embedded in the browser and players can donate any amount they want if they love your game.
developers.upload_your_game_description: Upload your indie game to <s>itch.io</s> for free. We host your game, along with your game's screenshots and other downloads. Your downloads are always available and always fast.
developers.share_message: itch.io is a simple way to distribute your indie games online for free.

app.share_message: itch, the desktop app for indie games
app.tagline: Install, update and play indie games
app.summary: The itch.io app, <s>itch</s>, lets you effortlessly download and run games and software from itch.io. All of your downloads are kept in a single place and are automatically updated. Access your collections and purchases, or browse for new games via the in-app browser.
app.more_info_links: <1>Read more on the FAQ</1> or <2>Read the app guide</2>
app.contribute_link: Want to contribute? View the source on GitHub
app.browse_header: Browse games like the creator intended
app.browse_description: On itch.io creators control how their project pages look. The built in browser lets you download and install games while exploring the unique page designs of our creators.
app.updates_description: Not only will the games you've installed automatically update, the app itself will automatically transform as we launch new functionality and features. Games using our new command line tools will generate delta patches, ensuring that you only download what's changed when new games come out.
app.web_games_description: You can sync any browser based games right into the app, letting you play them offline whenever you want. Once you're back online you'll be able to grab any updates if necessary.
app.languages_description: The itch app is available in over 20 languages, thanks to the itch.io community! Learn more about translating
app.community_description: Learn more about the development of the app <1>in our community</1>. Share feature requests and general feedback with other members of itch.io. If you're a programmer then you'll be glad to hear that the entire project is <2>open source on GitHub</2>, we look forward to your pull requests.
app.meta_description: itch, the best way to download and play indie games. Download free games and manage your library from your desktop. Now available for Windows, macOS and Linux.

profile.language_community_translation: itch.io is translated by members of our community. Some languages are only partially available. If you'd like to see itch.io in your language or help fix any mistakes you can contribute. Learn more
profile.username_description: Used to log into your account and for your page URL
profile.url_description: The public URL for your account
profile.profile_image_description: Shown next to your name when you take an action on the site (square dimensions)
profile.display_name_description: Name to be shown in place of your username, leave blank to default to username
profile.website_description: Optional URL to be shown on your profile page
profile.twitter_description: Twitter account to show on your profile
profile.account_type_description: How will you use your account
profile.default_language_option: Default (Set to English during languages beta)
profile.content_description: How content on itch.io is shown to you
profile.show_adult_content: Show content marked as adult in search & browse
profile.disable_autoloading_next_page_when_brows: Disable auto-loading next page when browsing
profile.click_to_load_games: Require a click to run HTML5 game embeds
profile.use_dark_theme: Use a dark theme where available
profile.profile_description: The content of your profile page
